item.title: Reverse engineering Linkeds lists
item.description: Oh hi. Personally, I’m not a big fan of competitive programming. Anyhow, I wanted to test my DSA skills so i started doing leetcode a week(or two ig)ago. And I spent an entire day solving some of those challenges. Eventually I came cross a medium level challege, named Reorder List. problem is pretty simple, you are given a head node of a linked list, what you have to do is kinda shuffle nodes around.
